ossj.common.ex
Interface JVTActivationSession

All Superinterfaces:
javax.ejb.EJBObject, javax.oss.JVTSession, java.rmi.Remote
public interface JVTActivationSession
extends javax.oss.JVTSession

EJB remote interface, the central interface of this package to create, manage and remove ManagedEntity.

Since:
March 2005
Version:
1.1
Author:
OSS through Java Initiative, Vincent Perrot Sun Microsystems Inc.
See Also:
JVTActivationHome
